reviewtext: I use a headset every day. The first one stopped working within a month, got it replaced (I have to pay for the return shipping) and the second one stopped working in a week (still have to put a warranty claim in). Decided to spend a few extra dollars and purchased the Plantronics HW261N Binaural Headset with the Plantronics 18straight Cable - Quick Disconnect To 2.5 Mm Plug,
